ai-atk-s0503a3:171_2: above: all sides and below, everywhere and all around;
ai-atk-s0503a3:171_3: By ... Helper of all : here “Instention” and so on.
ai-atk-s0503a3:171_4: all those beginning with the three: they are all impermanent, suffering, and perishable. They are to be impermanent, perishing, and changing.
ai-atk-s0503a3:171_5: So the Buddha has the meaning of that which is the clause of the kind or the censure which he has not adhered to, and which is stated in the sense of continuation without it.
ai-atk-s0503a3:172_0: When this is so, with right wisdom there is from the scrutinizing, this is the concept of the path for the complete understanding of the penetration of views, etc., that is the act of complete understanding that it cuts off the wrong view of craving and the wrong path. When all the time is given up in them, it doesn’t give up the desires rise to continued existence, and the produced by the complete understanding that craving.
ai-atk-s0503a3:172_1: So the giving up of craving for sensual pleasures in this way, etc., and the end of the eighth existence, and the end of all the noble path with the end of all activities, the aggregates, and the end of craving, and the noble path.
ai-atk-s0503a3:173_0: When craving is thus shown by craving, he said, “Now does so,” and “Now,” etc., in this way, “Now.”
ai-atk-s0503a3:173_2: Since this is so, the mendicant who has ended the defilements, the defilements is completed the spiritual journey, done what had to be done, laid down the burden, achieved their own goal, utterly ended the defilements, and is rightly freed through enlightenment.
ai-atk-s0503a3:173_3: When he is announced by the gods, Māra whirlpool, and the god as a debt, his vehicles and transport animals, and his mind inclines towards them. Then he is conquered to battle, untouevenly defeated, tied, attached, blind to the fifth, and expressed this heartfelt sentiment.
ai-atk-s0503a3:173_4: When he has rid himself of desires in this way, any characteristics beginning with what is contradicts it all of its characteristic, etc., and when its characteristics, etc., is complete in all its various parts, then where it doesn’t exist.
ai-atk-s0503a3:173_5: And that’s how the Buddha spent the Great Sanctuary relics (was heard).
